original_text: Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons. They are always cruel and they are never kind. They ride into the battle on their horses, and it sounds like the noise of the sea. They are ready to attack you, people of Jerusalem.’ Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons. They are always cruel and they are never kind. They ride into the battle on their horses, and it sounds like the noise of the sea. They are ready to attack you, people of Jerusalem.’ Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons.
korean_text: 그들은 활과 창을 잡았고 잔인하여 사랑이 없으며 그 목소리는 바다처럼 포효하는 소리라 그들이 말을 타고 전사 같이 다 대열을 벌이고 시온의 딸인 너를 치려 하느니라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: Its soldiers carry bows and spears as their weapons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 군사들은 활과 창을 무기로 들고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They ride into the battle on their horses,
and it sounds like the noise of the sea.
They are ready to attack you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신을 공격할 준비가 되어 있으며,
